biography.value: A nothic is a monstrous creature with terrible talons and a single great eye. When driven to violence, it uses its horrific gaze to rot the flesh from its enemies’ bones.

description.value:
The nothic makes two claw attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod + 1 type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a [[/save con 12 format=long]] against this magic or take [[/damage 3d6 type=necrotic average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must contest its &Reference[cha]{Charisma} (&Reference[dec]{Deception}) check against the nothic’s &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[ins]{Insight}) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being &Reference[charmed]{charmed}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Keen Sight. The nothic has advantage on &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
